activities:
Kognitio Inc does not receive any Kognitio company personal data from the EU or Switzerland.  
Kognitio does collect and store personal data for sales and marketing purposes.  This information is available to Kognitio employees in both the EU and US. This personal information is used to
•	Provide clients/prospects with information and advice about products and services that may be of interest
•	Assess and process any application for Kognitio products or services
•	Administer and manage the products and services Kognitio provide
•	Send you a company newsletter
Kognitio may disclose your personal information:
•	To Kognitio external service providers for marketing purposes. 
•	To all advisers appointed by Kognitio to assist with the administration of the service
•	If the disclosure is required by law as to comply with a subpoena, or similar legal process
Those parties which supply services to Kognitio, and to which Kognitio discloses personal information, have undertaken to comply with Kognitio confidentiality requirements under relevant legislation.
Kognitio also processes personal data from the EU and/or Switzerland on behalf of its clients.
Kognitio is an IT Software and Services company, providing software and also data reporting and analysis services to its clients.  Kognitio provides its clients with varying levels of service, from pure consultancy through to a full service, where Kognitio will receive and store a clients data and then provide the client with access to that data for reporting and analysis.
An agreement will be put in place between Kognitio and each Client, with Kognitio taking the role of Data Processor.  The agreement and associated documents will detail the service to be provided by Kognitio, including details of the data to be stored, processed and accessed (the data may include personal data).  The data processing required will be specified in detail. Kognitio is the Data Processor and will only undertake any activities on instruction from the Client.
Kognitio has its own Security and data protection procedures and policies that it works to and will agree any additional security or data protection requirements with each client and document these in the client agreement.  Kognitio’s policies and procedures adhere to the principles of the UK Data Protection act. Kognitio is ISO27001 certified.
Kognitio will always have a confidentiality agreement in place with clients.
All Kognitio staff receive training and follow-up briefings on security and data protection.
address: Two Prudential Plaza, 180 N. Stetson Street, Suite 3500
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line data, collected through the internet, off-line data and data that has been manually collected
